name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Heat oil in a wok. Add garlic and onion, stir-fry for 1 minute. Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes. Add soy sauce and serve hot with rice.

name: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Blend all fruits with milk, yogurt, and honey until smooth. Add ice if desired. Serve immediately.

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger. Add chicken and brown. Add tomatoes and curry powder. Pour coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes. Serve with rice.

name: Tomato Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package. Sauté garlic in olive oil, add chopped tomatoes and basil. Mix with pasta, top with cheese.

name: Egg Fried Rice
instructions: Heat oil, scramble eggs and set aside. Fry garlic and vegetables. Add cooked rice and soy sauce. Mix in eggs and serve hot.

name: Vegetable Soup
instructions: Sauté onions and celery. Add chopped vegetables and broth. Simmer until tender. Season with salt and pepper. Blend if desired.

name: Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter bread slices. Add cheese, tomato slices, and lettuce. Grill or toast until cheese melts. Serve hot.

name: Banana Pancakes
instructions: Mash bananas. Mix with eggs, flour, milk, and baking powder. Cook spoonfuls on buttered griddle until golden. Serve with syrup.

name: Chicken Salad
instructions: Dice cooked chicken. Mix with chopped vegetables. Dress with olive oil, lemon juice, and salt. Serve fresh.

name: Beef Stew
instructions: Brown beef cubes. Add onions and cook. Add vegetables, broth, and tomato paste. Simmer for 1.5 hours until tender.

name: Fish Tacos
instructions: Season and grill fish. Warm tortillas. Top with fish, shredded cabbage, sour cream, cilantro, and lime juice.

name: Yogurt Parfait
instructions: Layer yogurt with granola and fresh berries in a glass. Drizzle with honey. Top with banana slices.

name: Vegetable Pizza
instructions: Spread sauce on dough. Top with cheese and vegetables. Bake at 220°C for 15-20 minutes until crust is golden.

name: Potato Curry
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic. Add cubed potatoes and brown slightly. Add tomatoes, curry powder, and coconut milk. Simmer until potatoes are tender.

name: Apple Pie
instructions: Make dough with flour, butter, and egg. Slice apples and mix with sugar and cinnamon. Fill pie crust and bake at 180°C for 45 minutes.

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté onions and mushrooms. Add rice and toast. Add wine and broth gradually while stirring. Finish with butter and parmesan.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Tear lettuce into bowl. Add sliced grilled chicken, parmesan shavings, and croutons. Toss with caesar dressing and lemon juice.

name: Chocolate Smoothie
instructions: Blend banana, cocoa powder, milk, honey, and ice until smooth and creamy. Serve immediately.

name: Grilled Cheese
instructions: Butter outside of bread slices. Place cheese between slices. Grill on medium heat until golden brown and cheese melts.

name: Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs with salt. Melt butter in pan. Pour eggs and cook. Add cheese and vegetables. Fold and serve hot.

name: Carrot Cake
instructions: Mix grated carrots with flour, eggs, sugar, oil, and cinnamon. Bake at 180°C for 40 minutes. Frost with cream cheese frosting.

name: Seafood Paella
instructions: Sauté seafood and set aside. Cook rice with saffron, tomatoes, and broth. Add seafood and peas. Cook until rice is tender.

name: Lentil Soup
instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and carrots. Add lentils, tomatoes, broth, and cumin. Simmer for 30 minutes until lentils are tender.

name: Berry Muffins
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add eggs, milk, and melted butter. Fold in berries. Bake in muffin tins at 180°C for 20 minutes.

name: Chicken Wrap
instructions: Place grilled chicken on tortilla. Add lettuce, tomato, cucumber, cheese, and mayo. Roll tightly and serve.
